title: ANGLER DREAM EX-ALC Fly Reel 3/4 5/6 7/8 9/10WT CNC Machined Aluminum Fly Fishing Reels Silver/Gunsmoke Fly Reels
features: Solid and Light weight: Precision CNC-machined 6061-T6 aluminum alloy for high impact durability. Larger CNC hollow design makes the reel lighter than ordinary ones.

Meeting your needs: A killer fresh water fly reel for multi species fishing in rivers, lakes, streams, creeks. Ideal for all around fly fishing species such as Trout, Grayling, Salmon and other predatory fish.

Ready for you: The fly line, the fly backing and the fly leader are tied firmly together as a whole in the right order, which helps to get rid of the lengthy preparation of fly fishing and is very time saving and convenient.
Sturdy and durable: WF fly fishing line inside is woven from dacron braided line, outside covered with a layer of PVC, increasing the strength of the fly line.
Warning: This reel is designed for Clear water, After usage in saltwater, please open and clean the reel, or the one-way bearing maybe corroded.
description: 1. CNC-machined aluminum alloy construction for high durability and rigidity. Low-profile aluminum alloy spool for smooth line release. 2. Rotary knob system to control the line release resistance. 3. Delicate appearance, no wobble, no side play, smooth and easy to control. 4. Clear voices heard When you release the fishing line. Right and Left Handed Can be Retrieve. Please follow the stepï¼š 1.Release the spool from the reel frame. 2.And then you can find a white one way bearing under a spring clip in the center of the spool. 3.Take out the spring clip and the one way bearing. 4.Reverse load the one way bearing into the spool. 5.Put on the spring clip. 6.Over.
If Any Problem about The Product,Please Contact Us Firstly and Our Customer Service Will Solve It for You Soon.
